reviewText:

Not the best CandyGirl Video, but still respectable.  For soft core porn, CandyGirl and Hotbody are hard to beat, in my opinion.

Best panty CD I have seen.  Some segments are without panties, most end that way, but a lot of emphasis on panties.  Excellent photography and scenes.

A great idea ,but the cameraman's entire focus was on the ridiculously small thongs  and the genitalia of the girls. There are close ups ,closer close ups and ultra close ups. At one point I thought I was watching the "alien" in the movie of the same name. It was far to staged for my liking. Whatever happened to watching a girl  walking in a mini skirt and hoping a gust of wind would give you a glimpse of her panties or a flash of a garter belt. There was little emphasis on the women's legs or their arses it's just pussy. If thats your thing you'll love it I was hoping for something a little more than a staged upskirt show.

I have all the candy girl videos and this one is one of the best! It features a number of hot and sexy "girl next door" types with micah ashley and kobe lee leading the pack. The tiny outfits are incredible and the camera work is superb as always. I can't say enough about micah ashley. She is incredible. Her butt is an absolute work of art and the two upskirt scenes with her are outstanding. There is a lot more to comment on but the bottom line is this is well worth the money and  you will watch this video over and over; but keep a towel handy for the drool.
